event.description: Alex Mendez strikes out swinging.
Chad Taylor grounds out, second baseman Eduardo Nunez to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
James Ramsay flies out to left fielder Brett Gardner.
Defensive Substitution: Melky Mesa replaces center fielder Curtis Granderson, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Todd Brazeal called out on strikes.
Daniel Rockhold singles on a line drive to center fielder Melky Mesa.
Buddy Putnam grounds into double play, shortstop Derek Jeter to first baseman Mark Teixeira. Daniel Rockhold out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Brett Marshall replaces Adam Warren.
Defensive Substitution: Colin Curtis replaces right fielder Nick Swisher, batting 6th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Zoilo Almonte replaces left fielder Brett Gardner, batting 7th, playing left field.
Andrew Longley pops out to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Kyle Teaf grounds out, shortstop Derek Jeter to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Luis Llerena strikes out swinging, catcher Gustavo Molina to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Defensive Substitution: Doug Bernier replaces shortstop Derek Jeter, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Brandon Laird replaces first baseman Mark Teixeira, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: David Adams replaces second baseman Eduardo Nunez, batting 8th, playing second base.
Alex Mendez flies out to center fielder Melky Mesa.
Chad Taylor singles on a line drive to right fielder Colin Curtis.
James Ramsay grounds out, second baseman David Adams to first baseman Brandon Laird. Chad Taylor to 2nd.
Todd Brazeal flies out to left fielder Zoilo Almonte.
Ramiro Pena remains in the game as the third baseman.
Jorge Vazquez remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Defensive Substitution: Jose Gil replaces catcher Gustavo Molina, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Dan Burawa replaces Brett Marshall.
Daniel Rockhold singles on a line drive to center fielder Melky Mesa.
Buddy Putnam strikes out swinging and Daniel Rockhold caught stealing 2nd, catcher Jose Gil to shortstop Doug Bernier to first baseman Brandon Laird.
Blake Sydeski strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Juan Cedeno replaces Dan Burawa.
Kyle Teaf singles on a ground ball to pitcher Juan Cedeno.
Luis Llerena strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Austin Lueck replaces Alex Mendez.
Austin Lueck grounds into double play, third baseman Ramiro Pena to second baseman David Adams to first baseman Brandon Laird. Kyle Teaf out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Graham Stoneburner replaces Juan Cedeno.
Anthony Diaz strikes out swinging.
Jordan Strittmatter grounds out, second baseman David Adams to first baseman Brandon Laird.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Matt Hart replaces Todd Brazeal.
Matt Hart grounds out, shortstop Doug Bernier to first baseman Brandon Laird.
Defensive Substitution: Corban Joseph replaces third baseman Ramiro Pena, batting 4th, playing third base.
Cole Garner remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Ryan Pope replaces Graham Stoneburner.
Kyle Copack flies out to center fielder Melky Mesa.
Jimmy Falla hit by pitch.
Chris Norton strikes out swinging.
Kyle Teaf flies out to left fielder Zoilo Almonte.
Pitcher Change: Kevin Whelan replaces Ryan Pope.
Luis Llerena grounds out, shortstop Doug Bernier to first baseman Brandon Laird.
Austin Lueck strikes out swinging.
Anthony Diaz strikes out swinging, catcher Jose Gil to first baseman Brandon Laird.
Derek Jeter reaches on throwing error by third baseman Daniel Rockhold. Derek Jeter to 2nd.
Curtis Granderson singles on a line drive to right fielder James Ramsay. Derek Jeter scores.
Mark Teixeira flies out to left fielder Alex Mendez.
Alex Rodriguez pops out to second baseman Luis Llerena.
Raul Ibanez grounds out to first baseman Buddy Putnam.
Nick Swisher flies out to center fielder Chad Taylor.
Brett Gardner flies out to right fielder James Ramsay.
Eduardo Nunez triples (1) on a line drive to center fielder Chad Taylor.
Gustavo Molina flies out to left fielder Alex Mendez.
Pitcher Change: Devin Smith replaces Matthew Reed.
Derek Jeter grounds out, shortstop Kyle Teaf to first baseman Buddy Putnam.
Melky Mesa grounds out, shortstop Kyle Teaf to first baseman Buddy Putnam.
Mark Teixeira flies out to right fielder James Ramsay.
Defensive Substitution: Blake Sydeski replaces catcher Andrew Longley, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Alex Rodriguez singles on a ground ball to left fielder Alex Mendez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Ramiro Pena replaces Alex Rodriguez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Jorge Vazquez replaces Raul Ibanez.
With Jorge Vazquez batting, Ramiro Pena steals (1) 2nd base.
Jorge Vazquez grounds out sharply to first baseman Buddy Putnam.
Colin Curtis singles on a line drive to right fielder James Ramsay. Ramiro Pena scores.
With Zoilo Almonte batting, wild pitch by Devin Smith, Colin Curtis to 2nd.
Zoilo Almonte singles on a line drive to left fielder Alex Mendez. Colin Curtis scores. Zoilo Almonte to 2nd on the throw.
David Adams lines out to shortstop Kyle Teaf.
Gustavo Molina pops out to second baseman Luis Llerena.
Defensive Substitution: Kyle Copack replaces third baseman Daniel Rockhold, batting 5th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Jimmy Falla replaces first baseman Buddy Putnam, batting 6th, playing first base.
Pitcher Change: Michael Clarkson replaces Devin Smith.
Defensive Substitution: Jordan Strittmatter replaces right fielder James Ramsay, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Doug Bernier singles on a ground ball to third baseman Kyle Copack.
Melky Mesa reaches on throwing error by pitcher Michael Clarkson. Doug Bernier to 3rd. Melky Mesa to 2nd.
With Brandon Laird batting, passed ball by Blake Sydeski, Doug Bernier scores. Melky Mesa to 3rd.
Brandon Laird grounds out, third baseman Kyle Copack to first baseman Jimmy Falla.
Ramiro Pena triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Chad Taylor. Melky Mesa scores.
With Jorge Vazquez batting, wild pitch by Michael Clarkson, Ramiro Pena scores.

Melky Mesa grounds into double play, third baseman Kyle Copack to first baseman Jimmy Falla. David Adams out at 3rd.
Matt Hart remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Andrew Loynaz replaces Janick Serralonga.
Defensive Substitution: Chris Norton replaces catcher Blake Sydeski, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Brandon Laird singles on a line drive to center fielder Anthony Diaz.
Ramiro Pena singles on a line drive to right fielder Jordan Strittmatter. Brandon Laird to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Cole Garner replaces Jorge Vazquez.
Cole Garner singles on a line drive to left fielder Austin Lueck. Brandon Laird scores. Ramiro Pena to 2nd.
Colin Curtis singles on a ground ball to second baseman Luis Llerena. Ramiro Pena to 3rd. Cole Garner to 2nd.
Zoilo Almonte triples (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Jordan Strittmatter. Ramiro Pena scores. Cole Garner scores. Colin Curtis scores.
